issue.title: [C++] Support nesting of extension-id-registries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16657](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16657). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, only a default extension-id-registry is supported (under arrow/engine/substrait). Modifying this registry has global effects, which is often undesirable. Support for nesting extension-id-registries will provide scoping for such modifications.
